body.name: SJCODE 1080P Light Bulb Security Camera with Light, Wireless Wi-Fi Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance, Human Detection, Live View, Color Night Vision, 360 Degree Panoramic, 2-Way Audio, Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 17 mins
features: [Secure Cloud Storage] - Enjoy AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately) and a 30-day free trial to explore recording, reviewing, and sharing your videos with ease.
[Expansive 360° Panoramic Coverage] - Enjoy thorough monitoring with the camera's impressive 365° horizontal pan and 95° vertical tilt rang, providing extensive visibility.
[Environment-Sensitive Movement Lighting] - With motion in the vicinity and given that ambient light is within the set range, the lights on the device are triggered automatically.
[Vibrant Color Night Vision & Spotlights] - Maintain clear visuals of your property in low-light situations with vivid color night vision, ensuring around-the-clock surveillance.

[Easy Installation] - Simply screw the camera into any E27 bulb socket for a hassle-free setup. An E27 bulb socket is also provided in the package for added convenience, making installation quick and straightforward.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P Light Bulb Security Camera with Light, for Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance

1080P Light Bulb Security Camera Security Camera Light Bulb for Home Security with 2-Way Audio, Night Vision [Expansive 360° Panoramic Coverage] - Enjoy thorough monitoring with the camera's impressive 365° horizontal pan and 95° vertical tilt rang, providing extensive visibility.[Vibrant Color Night Vision & Spotlights] - Maintain clear visuals of your property in low-light situations with vivid color night vision, ensuring around-the-clock surveillance.

Seamless Two-Way Communication Effortlessly engage with visitors, ensuring smooth interaction and enhanced security. Motion-Activated Lighting Mode In the presence of detected motion and suitable ambient lighting conditions, the device will autonomously activate its lights. 360° Panoramic Coverage Enjoy thorough monitoring with the camera's impressive 365° horizontal pan and 95° vertical tilt rang, providing extensive visibility. Easy to Installation Simply screw the camera into any E27 bulb socket for a hassle-free setup.

Proactive Motion Detection Receive instant notifications on your mobile device when the camera detects movement, keeping you informed about activities around your home. Color Night Vision Maintain clear visuals of your property in low-light situations with vivid color night vision, ensuring around-the-clock surveillance. AI-Powered Human Tracking Capture comprehensive events with the camera's ability to detect and follow people within its view, reducing false alarms. Robust Cloud Storage Security Experience AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription plans (sold separately) for added convenience. Enjoy a 30-day trial.

What's the clarity level of the night vision feature in this light bulb security camera? The light bulb camera provides 1080p HD clarity, including at night with infrared vision, so you can monitor your home in any lighting, from anywhere. Is there an option to monitor the light bulb camera through a phone app? Certainly, accessing the video is feasible with the Aiwit app. Can this light bulb camera back up recorded videos to the cloud? Videos are saved only with a cloud service subscription, which includes a trial period. Should the service meet your needs, the subscription begins automatically after the trial, but cancellation is within the trial period if you’re dissatisfied. Will this light bulb camera work when connected to a 5GHz Wi-Fi network? Only 2.4G Wi-Fi is compatible with this light bulb camera. Separate your Wi-Fi into 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks with distinct names, and use the 2.4GHz for the camera. Do I have to have an SD card for this light bulb camera? The light bulb camera doesn't take SD cards. It saves videos in the cloud.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Motion activated video lightbulb
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to set up. What I like about it most is that the light comes on with motion activation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The light bulb is used for monitor the front of my house. It was a good choice and the price was great! Would definitely recommend the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this It was easy to set up and easy to use. Works well even in Wyoming weather. Glad I bought this.
